panels.description: Monitors which SeaweedFS Master instances are the current leaders
panels.title: Leader Status

panels.description: Tracks the number of leader changes for SeaweedFS Master instances
panels.title: Leader Changes

panels.description: Displays the number of SeaweedFS Master instances currently acting as leaders.
panels.title: SeaweedFS Master Leader Count

panels.description: Displays instances with detected replica placement mismatches for SeaweedFS Master instances.
panels.title: Replica Placement Mismatches

panels.description: Shows the increase in received heartbeats by type for SeaweedFS Master instances over a specified interval
panels.title: Heartbeats

panels.description: Shows the status of cluster locks
panels.title: Admin Lock Status

panels.description: Shows the 90th percentile latency of requests to SeaweedFS filer instances
panels.title: 90th Percentile of Filer Request Duration

panels.description: The query calculates the 95th percentile of request duration to the SeaweedFS filer over a specified time interval.
panels.title: 95th Percentile of Filer Request Duration

panels.description: The query calculates the 99th percentile of request duration to the SeaweedFS filer over a specified time interval.
panels.title: 99th Percentile of Filer Request Duration

panels.description: The query calculates the queries rate to the SeaweedFS filer in requests per second (RPS) over a specified time interval.
panels.title: Filer QPS

panels.description: The query calculates the 90th percentile of request duration to the SeaweedFS S3 interface over a specified time interval.
panels.title: 90th Percentile of S3 Request Duration

panels.description: The query calculates the 95th percentile of request duration to the SeaweedFS S3 interface over a specified time interval.
panels.title: 95th Percentile of S3 Request Duration

panels.description: The query calculates the 99th percentile of request duration to the SeaweedFS S3 interface over a specified time interval.
panels.title: 99th Percentile of S3 Request Duration

panels.description: The query calculates the average queries rate to the SeaweedFS S3 interface over a specified time interval, aggregated by request types and buckets.
panels.title: S3 API QPS

panels.description: This query calculates the 90th percentile of request durations to the SeaweedFS Volume Server over a specified time interval.
panels.title: Request Duration 90th percentile

panels.description: This query calculates the 95th percentile of request durations to the SeaweedFS Volume Server over a specified time interval.
panels.title: Request Duration 95th percentile

panels.description: This query calculates the 99th percentile of request durations to the SeaweedFS Volume Server over a specified time interval.
panels.title: Request Duration 99th percentile

panels.description: This query calculates the average query per second (QPS) to the SeaweedFS Volume Server over a specified time interval, aggregated by request type.
panels.title: Volume Server QPS

panels.description: This query calculates the number of volumes on the SeaweedFS Volume Server, aggregated by collection and type.
panels.title: Number of Volumes on Volume Server

panels.description: This query calculates the total disk size used on the SeaweedFS Volume Server, aggregated by collection and type.
panels.title: Total Disk Size on Volume Server

panels.description: This query calculates the total disk size used on the SeaweedFS Volume Server, aggregated by instance.
panels.title: Total Disk Size on Volume Server
